name: KLÖR
description:
Oneliner

KLÖR is a sci-fi RPG thriller, about a child who grows up and emotionally develops within the confines of a cult.

Features
  • A player character gradually shaped by the player’s choices
  • A bunch of characters to interact with
  • Interesting themes to dive into
  • A melancholic soundtrack
  • An adorable pet
Credits

Made by Sanne Ruhé and Thomas van Eekelen

Music by Mees van Tilburg

Additionals

This is a demo, representing roughly a third of the full intended experience.

Only the WIN64 version has been tested on a device, the others may or may not have issues.

Unpacked filesize is roughly 2.9GB, sorry about that.
